channel.title: Adding commands
channel.description:
OK im a BRAND new to coding, and i have allstarscape as my 317 source, since 317's are easier to code.
Now i wanna add a few commands in for staff. I wanna add for mods a new type of pure, (i cant remember how to do) Pickup, and i wanna fix the starter. If anyone has msn and would Like to help me on my server PLEASE DO!!!
Jordanm1996@aol.com
P.S. whoever helps will get Owner on my server ! :D

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[quote=“Ahyo, post:4, topic:352570”][quote author=freakinlost link=topic=448913.msg3293554#msg3293554 date=1280788107]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yourcommand") && playerRights >= #) {

change the # to
1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for owner
[/quote]
i know how to do that already, i just wanna know how to add some commands[/quote]

you make a command then add save and compile?

if your asking me a different question please elaborate…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:352571”]No spoonfeeding, and we don’t want owner on an unstable winterLove base.

Try the commands yourself, (there should be some in the source itself.)[/quote]that wont really help if umm…I just started? i use to remember to make new shops, add some commands, ect. but i forgot so would someone like to remind me?

Read full topic
